languages.text: "Когда он понял, что обнаружен... просто не стал оказывать сопротивления. Он просил встречи с Великим машинным духом. Когда понял, что блюстители не понимают, о чем речь — стал просить встречи с вами. Я посчитала уместным об этом сообщить".

"During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."
languages.original_text: "Когда он понял, что обнаружен... просто не стал оказывать сопротивления. Он просил встречи с Великим машинным духом. Когда понял, что блюстители не понимают, о чем речь — стал просить встречи с вами. Я посчитала уместным об этом сообщить".

traits.locale_text: "Upon realising his detection... he decided not to resist. Instead, he was asking for an audience with the Great machine spirit. When he realised that guardians don't understand what he was talking about, he started asking for a meeting with you. I considered it necessary to tell you about."

"Upon realising his detection... he decided not to resist. Instead, he was asking for an audience with the Great machine spirit. When he realised that guardians don't understand what he was talking about, he started asking for a meeting with you. I considered it necessary to tell you about."

"Upon realising the he had been detected... he decided not to resist. Instead, he asked for an audience with the Great machine spirit. When he realised that the guardians had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it appropriate to tell you about it."

"Upon realising the he had been detected... he decided not to resist. Instead, he asked for an audience with the Great machine spirit. When he realised that the guardians had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it appropriate to tell you about it."

"During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."

languages.text: “因为执法者在逮捕入侵者期间……他根本没有进行任何反抗。相反，他希望能与拥有‘伟大机魂’的人见一面。后来，他意识到那些执法者根本听不懂他在说什么，便要求和您见一面。我认为，这件事情您或许会感兴趣。”
languages.original_text: "During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."

traits.locale_text: “因为执法者在逮捕入侵者期间……他根本没有进行任何反抗。相反，他希望能与拥有‘伟大机魂’的人见一面。后来，他意识到那些执法者根本听不懂他在说什么，便要求和您见一面。我认为，这件事情您或许会感兴趣。”

languages.text: « Au moment de son arrestation, l'intrus... il n'a pas offert la moindre résistance. Au lieu de cela, il a demandé à pouvoir s'entretenir avec le "grand esprit de la machine". En constatant que les prévôts n'avaient aucune idée de ce dont il parlait, il a demandé à vous voir. J'ai donc jugé nécessaire de vous en informer aussitôt. »
languages.original_text: "During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."

traits.locale_text: « Au moment de son arrestation, l'intrus... il n'a pas offert la moindre résistance. Au lieu de cela, il a demandé à pouvoir s'entretenir avec le "grand esprit de la machine". En constatant que les prévôts n'avaient aucune idée de ce dont il parlait, il a demandé à vous voir. J'ai donc jugé nécessaire de vous en informer aussitôt. »

languages.text: "Der Eindringling ... leistete keinerlei Widerstand. Stattdessen bat er um eine Audienz 'beim Großen Maschinengeist'. Dann stellte er fest, dass die Enforcers nicht wussten, wovon er sprach, und bat um ein Treffen mit Euch. Ich hielt es für angebracht, Euch über die Situation in Kenntnis zu setzen."
languages.original_text: "During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."

traits.locale_text: "Der Eindringling ... leistete keinerlei Widerstand. Stattdessen bat er um eine Audienz 'beim Großen Maschinengeist'. Dann stellte er fest, dass die Enforcers nicht wussten, wovon er sprach, und bat um ein Treffen mit Euch. Ich hielt es für angebracht, Euch über die Situation in Kenntnis zu setzen."

languages.text: «Durante el arresto, el intruso... no ha opuesto resistencia alguna. En vez de eso, ha solicitado una audiencia con el "gran espíritu máquina". Al ver que el personal de seguridad no sabía de lo que estaba hablando, ha pedido verl{mf|o|a} a usted. Consideré apropiado informarl{mf|e|a}».
languages.original_text: "During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."

traits.locale_text: «Durante el arresto, el intruso... no ha opuesto resistencia alguna. En vez de eso, ha solicitado una audiencia con el "gran espíritu máquina". Al ver que el personal de seguridad no sabía de lo que estaba hablando, ha pedido verl{mf|o|a} a usted. Consideré apropiado informarl{mf|e|a}».

languages.text: 「発見されたことに気づいて…彼は抵抗しないことにしました。その代わり、大いなる機械精霊との謁見を求めました。エンフォーサーたちが何のことか理解していないことを知ると、今度は陛下に会いたいと言い出しました。この件は陛下のお耳に入れるのが適切だと思い、お伝えしている次第です」
languages.original_text: "During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."

traits.locale_text: 「発見されたことに気づいて…彼は抵抗しないことにしました。その代わり、大いなる機械精霊との謁見を求めました。エンフォーサーたちが何のことか理解していないことを知ると、今度は陛下に会いたいと言い出しました。この件は陛下のお耳に入れるのが適切だと思い、お伝えしている次第です」

languages.text: "Mütecaviz tutuklanırken... Direnmeye çalışmadı bile. Hatta sadece 'yüce makine ruhu' ile görüşmek istediğini söyledi. İnfazcıların kendisini anlamadığını görünce de sizinle konuşmayı arzuladığını belirtti. Ben de durumu size bildirmeyi gerekli gördüm."
languages.original_text: "During the arrest, the intruder... he offered no resistance at all. Instead, he asked for an audience with 'the great machine spirit.' When he realised that the enforcers had no idea what he was talking about, he asked to meet with you. I considered it necessary to apprise you of the situation."
